## MessageCenter.on() method

Listen to an event

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
on<Key extends keyof ITypedMessages>(event: Key, handler: (data: ITypedMessages[Key]) => void): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  event | Key | Name of the event |
|  handler | (data: ITypedMessages\[Key\]) =&gt; void | Handler of the event |

<b>Returns:</b>

() =&gt; void

a function, call it to remove this listener
